ygData.subject: Re: Castle Mistmoore (was: Trade of the Century..)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually i can go in and solo the maid, butler, princess, etc no problem. That is not to say the castle isnt a dangerous place. I died many, many a times
ygData.messageBody:
Actually i can go in and solo the maid, butler, princess, etc no problem.
That is not to say the castle isnt a dangerous place. I died many, many a
times trying to figure out how to do this. If i could, i would just explain
it, but i tried this already. There is no one single trick to mistmoore...
its a ton of little things that you learn over time. That being said, a
full party of lvl 40-50's can get decimated in mistmoore in no time flat.
You pull a couple of harm touching mobs (who knew cooks could harm
touch!?!) and you wont even make it into melee range. I know lvl 50 druids
that go in there and solo the place constantly also, you just have to be
willing to spend some time there. Just dont wander in with a full group and
expect to own the place :)

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Encoh Lyciferous, lvl 40 Necromancer
Tunare


At 10:44 AM 10/13/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
>>Dunno your level or type of group you play with, but you
>>are in error (not a direct personal attack, maybe just
>>misinformed)
>
>Then I have been misinformed by hundreds of people I talk to
>across every single server. I have never heard of a two man
>team doing the castle reliably, you must have got really lucky.
>
>Parties of full L50s have had to evac from the castle.
>And I know for sure that L40-45 parties are vulernable.
>
>If it was as easy as you say, then there would be a lot
>more Soulfires and EBWs and Nightshade Wreaths floating
>around. People are 'afraid' of the castle and for good
>reason. It's not the picnic people make it out to be.
>
>However: I will give you this, that in wolf form you
>could invade the castle, harmony everything, and possibly
>pull and kill one thing at a time. If that's the ticket,
>then I understand your point. But to a group with no
>pack wolf form, trains are the ultimate killer.
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
